item.description:
I was thinking we should have a meetup where we just get together and work on any projects we currently have. We could learn from each other and see what other people are doing.

I can show my homemade security system, as well as my wireless laundromat system (lets me know when laundry is done).  Bring your own projects and we'll work on them!

I will have to charge $5/pp for this event to help cover costs.  I'll have a goodie bag of parts if you decide to come!

UPDATE: Date changed, check the new time!
item.name: General Project Work
